songs.title: Just Like You*
songs.lyrics:
**Snippet**

[Verse]
Can't get you outta my head
I rather love you instead
I need somebody when you're gone
With a voice like you and a face like you

[Chrous]
I need somebody when you're gone
Somebody just like you, just like you
I need somebody when you're gone
Somebody just like you, just like you
